summary: The document is an identification form from the JFK assassination system records, dated 08/24/98, focusing on an investigation into Robert Scheer. It details a check of various sheriff's offices and police departments for any records on Scheer, with no findings reported. The document, originally classified, was released with deletions and last reviewed on 03/07/95, suggesting its inclusion in historical records made public.
key_findings: Document is part of the JFK assassination system records.
Focuses on an investigation into Robert Scheer, with no records found in local agencies.
Originally classified but released with deletions.
Last reviewed in 1995, indicating it may be part of historical records released to the public.
